text: 13.30: Mt 3.12Kamata mandɨta mitɨra arɨkita kɨhɨrɨhɨrɨ arutɨmu. Kamatu tahɨratahɨra tɨwɨmi kru sɨmbɨra mɨŋɨmandɨyu haŋɨnɨŋɨrɨm ambɨrɨman, Tɨpa ñamba haŋɨnɨŋ wɨsa tahɨrandahɨra kɨtɨ kahaŋgaha ahuyɨ kɨrahɨrarɨm tamamara. Kamata wit avi haŋɨnɨŋ yɨvutɨhɨruramata huyɨmandavɨ yandɨyɨ tamamamara, vamba ambami, vami.
